articles.title: Gunathilaka quits Tests to concentrate on white-ball cricket - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The 30-year-old batter hasn't been a regular in the longest format, having played the last of his eight Tests in December 2018

articles.title: Cheteshwar Pujara reminds me of Hashim Amla, blessing to have him in the team: Sunil Gavaskar - India Today
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar said that Cheteshwar Pujara reminds him of former South Africa opener Hashim Amla. Gavaskar further added that players with Pujara's temperament are a blessing to the dressing room.
